required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prophylactic Funnel Mesh to Prevent Parastomal Hernia in Permanent End Colostomy After Abdomino-perineal Resection
clinical_study.official_title: Prophylactic Funnel Mesh to Prevent Parastomal Hernia in Permanent End Colostomy: A Retrospective Cohort Study

brief_summary.textblock: This retrospective study asses if a prophylactic, funnel-shaped, intraperitoneal mesh prevents parastomal hernia in patients undergoing abdominoperineal rectum resection with permanent end colostomy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: initial operation until an avarage of 3 years
primary_outcome.description: clinical or radiological diagnosed parastomal hernia

secondary_outcome.time_frame: initial operation until an avarage of 3 years
secondary_outcome.description: Reoperation due to problems caused by parastomal hernia

secondary_outcome.time_frame: initial operation until an avarage of 3 years
secondary_outcome.description: any complications due to the mesh

arm_group.description: patients undergoing abdominoperineal resection with end colostomy and implantation of a prophylactic, funnel-shaped, intraperitoneal mesh
patients undergoing abdominoperineal resection with end colostomy without implantation of a prophylactic, funnel-shaped, intraperitoneal mesh

intervention.description: Implantation of a prophylactic, 3D funnel-shaped, intraperitoneal, non-absorbable and synthetic mesh (Dyna Mesh IPST 2x15x15 cm™ and 3x16x16 cm™, FEG Textiltechnik, Aachen, Germany,)

study_pop.textblock: Patients receiving elective abdominoperineal resection between January 2013 and December 2018 at the Cantonal Hospital of St. Gallen

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- elecitve abdominoperineal resection
Exclusion Criteria:
- rejection of a retrospective data Analysis
- age under 18 years
- meshes other than the funnel-shaped mesh

patient_data.ipd_description: Data will be made available to researchers whose proposed use of the data has been approved.
